name: The Light Keeper (ZuzeloApps)
description:
In this game you will play as a Polymorph, a creature that can take shape of the monsters it kills.  That is done by consuming their souls. More souls you eat - stronger you can be. 

Your goal is to keep the fire burning, otherwise you will be absorbed by the shadows. To do so, you have to feed the souls of your enemies to the fire.
